use_case.title: Modify basic portal configuration
use_case.description: A Portal Administrator may modify the basic configuration of its portal, including its name, mission statement, layout, and look & feel.

trigger.value: The Portal Administrator wants to modify an existing portal

use_case.basic_path:
1. The Portal Administrator navigates to the configuration page for the portal by selecting the link 'Configure Portal'.
  2. She chooses the 'Basic' tab to modify:
    • Mission statement (PSRV-00011:Modify Portal Mission)
    • Portal Name (<PSRV-00012:Modify Portal Name)
  3. She chooses the 'Layout' tab to:
    • Change the layout of portlets (PSRV-00100:Add a Tab to a Portal)
    • Rename a Portal Tab (PSRV-00140:Change Name of Existing Portal Tab
    • Delete a Portal Tab (PSRV-00120:Delete a Portal Tab)
    • Re-order tabs in a Portal (PSRV-00150:Reorder Portal Tabs)
    • Add and Delete Portlets from a Portal (PSRV-00200:Add a Portlet to a Portal Tab PSRV-00210:Delete a Portlet from a Portal Tab)
use_case.success_end_conditions: The basic attributes of the portal are updated.
